context-view.name: Assessment
context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)Name.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%> <%=(html)Name.givenName%> <%if DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> (<%end if%><%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth.toString())%>) <%end if%> <%if Exclusion%> <%=(html)Exclusion%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Edit Read History
context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)Name.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%> <%=(html)Name.givenName%> <%if DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> (<%end if%><%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth.toString())%>) <%end if%> <%if Exclusion%> <%=(html)Exclusion%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Form

data-appender-entry.parameter-string: <%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each group in Concerto.groups%><%exec config.setOption( group.name, "" )%><%end for%>
<%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each location in Concerto.locations%><%exec config.setOption( location.name, "" )%><%end for%>
<%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each relationshipType in Concerto.getContextView("Form").relationshipTypes%><%exec config.setOption(relationshipType.name, "")%><%end for%>

context-view.description: Displays information about a clinical Form.

entity-access-policy.name: Personal
entity-access-policy.description: Documents created using a personal form can only be viewed by the form owner. Any further access to documents needs to be granted by the form owner. Personal forms do not appear in any search results.

entity-access-policy.name: Private
entity-access-policy.description: Documents created using a private form can only be viewed by the form owner. Any further access to documents needs to be granted by the form owner. Private forms are displayed in search results.

entity-access-policy.name: Public
entity-access-policy.description: Documents created using a public form can be viewed by all users. Any further permissions need to be granted by the form owner.

context-view.format:
<%if Request.getServletPath().endsWith("WorkLists.htm") || Request.getServletPath().endsWith("History.htm")%> <%var inList = true%> <%end if%> <%if Request.patientInContext = "true"%> <%var patientInContext = true%> <%end if%> <%if inList%>
<%=FormName%> <%=Description%> Show more... <%if User.isMemberOf("Forms Maintainers")%> <%end if%>
<%else%> <%=FormName%> Form. The list of documents is not the complete clinical record. <%end if%>

information-access-policy.name: Default
information-access-policy.description: The default container that is used for configuring both Document and Form level security.

context-view.name: Notification Date Adjustment
context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)Name.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%> <%=(html)Name.givenName%> <%if DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> (<%end if%><%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth.toString())%>) <%end if%> <%if Exclusion%> <%=(html)Exclusion%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Patient

context-appender-parameter.name: sql
context-appender-parameter.value: select patientID, patientdeathindicator from orion_patientDemographicsMini where patientID in (<%var index=0%><%for each context in contextList%>'<%="".valueOf(context.mrn).replace("'","''")%>'<%if index!=(contextList.size - 1)%>,<%end if%><%var index=index+1%><%end for%>)

entry-point.name: CCR DR Dynamic Patient Summary (Admin View)

data-appender-entry.parameter-string: <%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each group in Concerto.groups%><%exec config.setOption( group.name, "" )%><%end for%>
<%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each location in Concerto.locations%><%exec config.setOption( location.name, "" )%><%end for%>
<%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each relationshipType in Concerto.getContextView( "Patient" ).relationshipTypes%><%exec config.setOption( relationshipType.name, "" )%><%end for%>
<%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each role in Concerto.roles%><%exec config.setOption( role.name, "" )%><%end for%>

context-view.description: Displays information from the standard [hl7.org] "Patient" and, if available, "Encounter" context subjects. Displays the first available identifier out of the Medical Record Number (MRN), Master Patient Index (MPI), National Id Number or Alternate Identifier. If a site-defined suffix is used then the Context Format may need to be modified to display this identifier. Following the identifier, the patients family name is displayed in capitals and then the given name in normal case. The patient's middle initials or name are omitted. The Sex and Age of the patient is displayed in a compact format (Sex/Age). Information about the class of the patient (Emergency, Inpatient, Outpatient, Preadmit, Recurring, Obstetrics) is then displayed. The servicing facility location description is also displayed if available. If there is no discharge date then that patient's assigned location description is displayed. Finally, the admit and discharge dates are displayed. If these are the same then only one date is displayed. If there is an admission date but no discharge date then "current" is used. Two favourite context lists are set up, one for recent patients that the user has accessed, and one that the user can add or remove selected patients to. Applications with entry points that open in a patient context should be made available from this context view. In general, this includes Concerto's Clincial Document Viewer.

entity-access-policy.name: Default
entity-access-policy.description: This is the default patient access policy

entity-access-policy.name: Error
entity-access-policy.description:
This is the patient access error policy. If an error occurs when attempting to evaluate the access a user has to a patient then this policy will be applied.
If an error occurs while evaluating the access level allowed by this policy, an error will be returned to the user and they won't be able to access any patient information. It is recommended that you only reason against data gathered from the preconfigured Concerto data appenders in the rule conditions in this policy.

context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)PatientName.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%>, <%=(html)PatientName.givenName%> <%=(html)PatientName.middleInitialOrName%> <%if Sex <> "" || DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> <%=(html)DateFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth, "dd/MM/yyyy")%> (<%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth)%>) <%if Sex%><%=(html)Sex%> <%end if%> <%end if%>

information-access-policy.name: Default
information-access-policy.description: This is the default information access policy

information-access-policy.name: Error
information-access-policy.description:
This is the information access error policy. If an error occurs when attempting to evaluate the access a user has to a patient's information then this policy will be applied.
If an error occurs while evaluating the access level allowed by this policy, an error will be returned to the user and they won't be able to access any patient information. It is recommended that you only reason against data gathered from the preconfigured Concerto data appenders in the rule conditions in this policy.

worklist-column.display-format: <%if value.toString().trim().equals("ACTCC")%> ACT Health Public <%elseif value.toString().trim().equals("CHCACT")%> Calvary Health Care <%elseif value.toString().trim().equals("DHHCC")%> ACT Health <%else%> <%=value%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Radiology Reading
context-view.description: This context is used to enable radiologist to easily access patient related data.
context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)Name.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%> <%=(html)Name.givenName%> <%if DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> (<%end if%><%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth.toString())%>) <%end if%> <%if Exclusion%> <%=(html)Exclusion%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Radiology Reading (Admin)
context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)Name.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%> <%=(html)Name.givenName%> <%if DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> (<%end if%><%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth.toString())%>) <%end if%> <%if Exclusion%> <%=(html)Exclusion%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: Referral

context-view.format: <%if MRN%> <%=(html)MRN%> <%elseif MPI%> <%=(html)MPI%> <%elseif NationalIdNumber%> <%=(html)NationalIdNumber%> <%elseif Alternate%> <%=(html)Alternate%> <%end if%> <%=(html)PatientName.familyName.toString().toUpperCase()%>, <%=(html)PatientName.givenName%> <%=(html)PatientName.middleInitialOrName%> <%if Sex <> "" || DateTimeOfBirth <> ""%> <%=(html)DateFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth, "dd/MM/yyyy")%> (<%=AgeFormat.format(DateTimeOfBirth)%>) <%if Sex%><%=(html)Sex%> <%end if%> <%end if%>

worklist-column.display-format: <%if value.toString().trim().equals("ACTCC")%> ACT Health Public <%elseif value.toString().trim().equals("CHCACT")%> Calvary Health Care <%elseif value.toString().trim().equals("DHHCC")%> ACT Health <%else%> <%=value%> <%end if%>

context-view.name: ReviewEDS Patient

data-appender-entry.parameter-string: <%exec config.setAdvanced(true)%><%for each group in Concerto.groups%><%exec config.setOption( group.name, "" )%><%end for%>

Displays the first available identifier out of the Medical Record Number (MRN), Master Patient Index (MPI), National Id Number or Alternate Identifier. If a site-defined suffix is used then the Context Format may need to be modified to display this identifier. Following the identifier, the patients family name is displayed in capitals and then the given name in normal case. The patient's middle initials or name are omitted.
